quote: Creativity flows when the mind is light. Be light and ignite your imagination.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Creativity is a flower of love and a light that is eager to enlighten others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My hand is the extension of the thinking process - the creative process.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: Creating a better futureRequires creativity in the present.
author: Matthew Goldfinger

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Clear thinking at the wrong moment can stifle creativity.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough that you want to enhance its beauty, you want to bring a little more music to it, a little more poetry to it, a little more dance to it.
author: Osho

quote: Human beings have an extraordinary capacity to imagine possibilities and then turn those possibilities into realities. Evident in the gifts of civilization—in our arts, languages, sciences, technologies, businesses, governments, and so on—it is clear that we are a profoundly creative species. Yet many of us only access a smidgen of our creativity.
author: Scott Edmund Miller

quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Anxiety is the handmaiden of creativity
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Nothing is more creative... nor destructive... than a brilliant mind with a purpose.
author: Dan Brown,  Inferno

quote: There is creative reading as well as creative writing.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Creative without strategy is called 'art.' Creative with strategy is called 'advertising.'
author: Jef I. Richards

quote: Surprise is where creativity comes in.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Creativity becomes more visible when adults try to be more attentive to the cognitive processes of children than to the results they achieve in various fields of doing and understanding.
author: Loris Malaguzzi

quote: The creative mind seeks chance and accident while everyone else seeks control and order. Rod Judkins ‘Change Your Mind
author: Rod Judkins,  Change Your Mind: 57 Ways to Unlock Your Creative Self

quote: To me, all creativity is magic. Ideas start out in the empty void of your head - and they end up as a material thing, like a book you can hold in your hand. That is the magical process. It's an alchemical thing. Yes, we do get the gold out of it but that's not the most important thing. It's the work itself.
author: Alan Moore

quote: The very essence of the creative is its novelty, and hence we have no standard by which to judge it.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: The highest prize we can receive for creative work is the joy of being creative. Creative effort spent for any other reason than the joy of being in that light filled space, love, god, whatever we want to call it, is lacking in integrity. . .
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Creativity thrives where its roots are crowded.
author: Ozzie Zehner,  Green Illusions

quote: Get off the treadmill of consumption, replication, and mediocrity. Begin lifting the weights of creativity, originality, and success.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Art resides in the quality of doing, process is not magic.
author: Charles Eames

quote: Imagination is what you do with your inspiration.
author: Violet Haberdasher

quote: A composition—and every work of art is one—is created in a wondrous interplay between imagination and reason, or between mind and reflection. For there will always be an element of chance in the creative process.
author: Jostein Gaarder,  Sophie's World

quote: To be creative means to connect. It's to abolish the gap between the body, the mind and the soul, between science and art, between fiction and nonfiction.
author: Nawal El Saadawi

quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: In tough and desperate times when your creativity begs to be birthed, loose the confines of the ground; stand up in your faith and walk atop the waves…
author: Stanice Anderson

quote: In order to be creative rules cannot exist. The creative mind deserves no less.
author: Steven Cuoco,  Guided Transformation

quote: You create your own masterpiece as your actions draw pictures of your life canvas.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Create with the heart; build with the mind.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Success is fickle, but creativity is a gift.
author: Tommy Shaw

quote: Anything creative requires a bit of acting,and filling in blanks with imagination.
author: Christina Westover

quote: Dance above the surface of the world. Let your thoughts lift you into creativity that is not hampered by opinion.
author: Red Haircrow

quote: File under "Hard Truths": the creative muse is fiction. If you sit around waiting for the right moment to create, you will die waiting.
author: Antony Johnston

quote: Trying to force creativity is never good.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: Art is a process, not a product.
author: MaryAnn F. Kohl

quote: The neural processes underlying that which we call creativity have nothing to do with rationality. That is to say, if we look at how the brain generates creativity, we will see that it is not a rational process at all; creativity is not born out of reasoning.
author: Rodolfo R. Llinás,  I of the Vortex: From Neurons to Self

quote: Creative output, you know, is just pain. I'm going to be cliche for a minute and say that great art comes from pain.
author: Kanye West

quote: When the creative impulse sweeps over you, grab it. You grab it and honor it and use it, because momentum is a rare gift.
author: Justina Chen,  North of Beautiful

quote: Through art, you create your own world.
author: Daphne Guinness

quote: ...talent is evenly distributed. You never know how many talented people are out there until you invite and inspire them to be creative.
author: John Wood,  Creating Room to Read: A Story of Hope in the Battle for Global Literacy

quote: Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't "try"to do things. You simply "must"do things.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul.
author: Deepak Chopra,  Life After Death: The Burden of Proof

quote: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Creativity is knowing how to hide your sources
author: C.E.M. Joad

quote: Art is the reflection of an imaginative mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Carrots and Creativity [10w] Put a carrot in front of you for optimal creativity.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The creative adult is the child who has survived.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin
